title: Difficult Interface
text:
Updated after Developer response (thank you)

It took me a while to get around in Revolut, what is obvious to them isn‚Äôt necessarily obvious to a user. Once you know your way around the app and service function as expected. 

Unclear interface and user experience in some important ways, unless you work for Revolut:

For example  I tried to find help about returning funds back to spending from a vault (savings), but they refer to a link that says ‚Äúwithdraw‚Äù under the Vault page. But what they don‚Äôt tell you is that to get there you must:
1. Click on the menu item Vaults
2. Even though you are already there, you must click on your vault again from a list which isn‚Äôt obvious unless you‚Äôve created more than one Vault. 
3. Click on your desired vault, in my case just one. 

Result: after a bit of rabbit holing, you will find the Withdraw link. 

Just an example of ‚Äúdifficulty‚Äù. There are others but trying to keep this short.

title: Excellent
text: Not the type to give reviews but Revolut is an excellent app with great customer support. Highly recommend.
